attributes.action: TREAT OUR INJURED SOLDIERS PROPERLY IN SAFE & SECURE MILITARY FACILITIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT IS MONSTROUS FOR TONY BLAIR TO SEND OUR MEN & WOMEN TO WAR AND NOT TREAT THEM PROPER CONDITIONS IN THE U.K. WHEN RETURNED INJURED .

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
